name: sharedlm-monorepo

scripts.build:server: cd apps/server && python -c "from app import app; from database import models; from database import crud; from utils import encryption, security, cache, prompt; from services import llm_router, mem0_client; print('✅ All imports successful')"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:web
scripts.verify:server: cd apps/server && python -c "import sys; from app import app; from database import models; from database import crud; from utils import encryption, security, cache, prompt; from services import llm_router, mem0_client; print('✅ All imports successful')" && pip check
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/web && npm install
scripts.check:backend: cd apps/server && pip check && python -c "from app import app; from database import models; from config import settings; print('✅ Backend check passed')"
scripts.check:all: npm run check:backend && npm run check:frontend && npm run test
scripts.pre-commit: npm run verify && npm run test

description: SharedLM Monorepo - Unified AI Chat Interface
author: SharedLM Team
